summary: This documentary-style film shows how government agencies try to cope with human mankind's first contact with alien life.
cast: Mazlan Othman|Paul Beaver|Janos Tisovszky|Michael Boyce|Niklas Hedman|Sheryl Bishop|John D. Rummel|Douglas Vakoch|Chris McKay|Jacques Arnould|Chris Welch|Vickie Sheriff|Ernst Fasan|Michael Dangl|Birgit Radeschnig|Nicole Radeschnig|Christian Reiner|Kurt Waldheim|Perica Antov
keywords: slow motion|slow paced|hypothetical situation|television signal|radio signal
title: The Visit
